title: Choral Beauty Music Pack
description: A collection of 20 choral music pieces in an ancient, medieval style. This music has a spiritual feel, evoking ruined cathedrals and haunted chapels.
longDescription:
A collection of 20 choral music pieces in an ancient, medieval style. This music has a spiritual feel, evoking ruined cathedrals and haunted chapels.


Sample Music from the Pack


20 original tracks:

1. Ancient Aeolian Chant 3:10

2. Ancient Dorian Chant 2:46

3. Ancient Ionian Chant 2:36

4. Ancient Phrygian Chant 3:10

5. Beautiful Female Choir 0:55

6. Cathedral Choir 2:26

7. Choir From Heaven 1:01

8. Cinematic Minimal Choir 1:21

9. Full Calm Female Choir 2:40

10. Gregorian Chant Laetatus Sum 5:00

11. Gregorian Chant Venite Ad Me 6:45

12. Gregorian Plainchant Aeolian 2:20

13. Gregorian Plainchant Mixolydian 3:51

14. Inside the Grand Cathedral 2:51

15. Lush Beautiful Choir 2:07

16. Powerful Medieval Choir 1:56

17. Sacred Spiritual Voices 2:06

18. Solemn Voices 2:13

19. Somber Choir and Strings 2:09

20. Spiritual Womens Choir 2:09
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  20 original pieces of choral music
  •  high quality 44/16 WAV files
  •  over 50 minutes of music

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes (non lseamless)

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All
